# polytomic_marketo_connection (Resource)

Marketo Connection

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "polytomic_marketo_connection" "marketo" {
  name = "example"
  configuration = {
  }
}
```

- `configuration` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--configuration))

- `id` (String) Marketo Connection identifier
